Welcome to Soundaries! Lets help you get started.
Soundaries is a location-based ringer manager

With Soundaries, you can choose a location and set that location\'s ringer volume. Any time you enter the area, your ringer will automatically adjust to the value you set. Don\'t worry, once you leave the area, your volume will set right back to where it was.
There are 2 ways to begin adding a new Soundary
1) Using the search bar
l) Type the address or the name of the location into the search bar
ll) Choose the result you\'re looking for
2) Long Press
Simply press and hold the location on the map

A pin should be placed on your chosen location. Now set, the desired ringer volume and radius on the sliders below. We recommend a radius of at least 150 meters for greater location accuracy. Just hit the check button and you\'re done! You\'ve added your first Soundary. You can test it out if you\'d like by entering and exiting the set area.
There are two ways to begin editing you soundaries
1) Select your Soundary from the side drawer
l) Tap the = icon on the top left of the screen (or slide out from the left edge)
ll) Select your Soundary form the list
2) Tap your Soundary\'s marker on the map
Your Soundary should center on the screen and it\'s information should slide up from the bottom.
- Move the sliders to your desired settings
- You can also begin editing the locations\'s name by tapping on it
- Don\'t forget to hit the check button when you\'re done
- To cancel your charges, dismiss the information view by dragging it to the bottom of the screen
- To delete, tap the trash can icon
Good Luck and enjoy the app!
